Name: Spectre
Description:
Infiltration unit. Can use Ultrasonic Pulse and Cloak. Can also call down Tactical Nukes built at the Ghost Academy.

Can attack ground and air units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to holster their weapons and avoid engaging enemies, unless given a direct command. Units holding fire will flee if attacked.
Root.Name: Hold Fire

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Root.Name: Weapons Free

Root.Tooltip:
Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 10 seconds to land, but they deal up to 300 (+200 vs. structures) damage to enemies in a large radius.

Purchase charges at the Ghost Academy.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike

Root.Tooltip: 汇聚一股灵能冲击波，对目标区域内单位造成50点伤害，并打断这些单位的施法进程。
Root.Name: Mindblast

Root.Tooltip: Create an energy barrier for Tosh, absorb incoming damage. Last for 10, or end after absorbing 500 damage.
Root.Name: Psi Shield

Root.Tooltip: Takes control of the target unit. Domination lasts until the controlled unit is destroyed or released.
Root.Name: Domination

Root.Tooltip: Releases Nova's current Domination target, returning it to its original alliance.
Root.Name: Release Minion
